name: Flip It (Zefo_Zadkiel)
description:
A simple puzzle game, with a not that simple solution The objective is simple, all you have to do is flip the circles, until all of them become to the yellow color. But each time a circle flip, other circle around it may flip to! Try every combination, do random moves, and flip all of them! Go ahead, lets flip it!

A game made it in just 4 hours!
